item.description:
This meetup is sponsored and delivered by Chris Adshade who runs the Central Mass Hypnosis and NLP Meetup.  This sounds absolutely intriguing.  Don't Miss it! 

Original posting was for Panara Bread in Marlborough but this has now been moved to the Marlborough Public Library Story Hour room.  Information listed above. 

Hypnotic Journey of Creativity 

Come join the meetup group as we discuss creativity and the mind.

We will talk about how the mind works with images and creativity--something that gets stifled as we get older. Kids have an amazing ability to do it and enjoy it. Can you remember "daydreaming"??? Perhaps you got scolded for doing it as you got older, that happens to many of us! Well now is your time to indulge yourself and your senses!!!

I have a unique exercise planned to help you along the way.... It will be low key but fun! Something that you probably need with our hectic schedules!

You will walk away with a new perspective!

Come out and Enjoy.......See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs in the Story Hour room.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: HYPNOTIC JOURNEY OF CREATIVITY
